name: Dudu
info: A Sinner who is adept at supporting allies. Enters the battle with Ultimate Energy fully charged.

media.title: JP Dudu Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

maniaIntensifyText: When an allied unit marked with [Phoenix's Call] is on the field, Dudu restores 1% of Max HP her second.
criminalRecord:
Dudu is an unregistered Outlander who entered Syndicate illegally from a satellite city five years ago. In these five years, she has committed many crimes in DisCity, like business fraud and conducting business without a license. She is the bane of the lives of the Syndican citizens.

Dudu helped Oak Casket traffic in contraband, and then helped cover up Oak Casket's criminal activities. This is a serious crime; she must be detained immediately.

--

As an Outlander, the subject was a nomad prior to detention and had a rough lifestyle. In the highly unstable environment in Syndicate, she already chose the least harmful way to make a living.

After being detained by the MBCC, her life has greatly improved. She also uses her power to aid Sinner missions. The subject's power provides effective assistance and she has played a key role in several missions.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Dudu uses sound waves to stimulate the secretion of adrenalin, a substance that enhances one's self-healing ability and physical strength. By concentrating her mind, she can direct her power at a specific person.

+++* Awakening Signs
Dudu got caught in a gang war when she was a teenager, and was infected with Mania after being exposed to the Mania weapons used in the war. The infection was worsened by her prolonged exposure to the corpses of Corruptors, and she eventually awakened her power.

+++* Corruption State
The physical examination conducted by the MBCC on Dudu shows that the results for each item except //severity of infection// are within the normal range; Dudu suffers from a low level of Maniac corruption, but no abnormalities have been found on her body, and her mental status is relatively stable.
ecbFlavourText: "May misfortunes be gone and confusion be broken. May you part with pain, find happiness, and gain eternal bliss."
interrogation1:
Since being brought to the Bureau, Dudu has been an insufferable menace, playing suona at all hours and becoming the source of dozens of noise complaints. The Chief confronts her about this in the interrogation room, threatening to confiscate her suona if she doesn't comply. Dudu lashes out uncharacteristically, snapping that she was never judged for pursuing her passion in Drifter Camp. Seemingly attempting to get them to inquire further, the Chief relents and asks about the goings on, to which Dudu replies in remarkably comprehensive detail. Although the Chief is impressed, this turns out to be nothing more than another of Dudu's ploys, her goal being to return to Drifter Camp as an "intelligence agent." Though they refuse, the Chief still strikes up a bargain with her, saying that as long as she adheres to noise regulations, they will have the MBCC's intelligence agents personally share all info relating to Drifter Camp with her. Dudu agrees and skips cheerily out of the room.

Dudu demonstrates her thorough knowledge of the Drifter Camp during the interrogation. Despite refusing her request to release her back to the Drifter Camp, you promise to share some of the information you pry out of the camp. In exchange, Dudu agrees to obey the Bureau's rules. Finally, the problem troubling you for days is solved.
interrogation2:
A few days later, Dudu barges into the Chief's office, claiming that someone in Drifter Camp has information on Parma. Although suspicious, the Chief immediately mobilizes a unit, only to find a senile old woman alone in her apartment. Dudu insists that she is in fact the source of intel, and after being prompted, the woman starts to mumble about "Pa… ma…", as well vague places such as "the old elm tree" and "the chicken coop." After suddenly shooing them out of her home, Dudu explains that the woman's dementia has worsened since the growth of her brain tumor, having actually requested that Dudu be the one to perform her funeral rites. The Chief doubts that the woman was actually saying "Parma," having almost heard a third, middle syllable, but Dudu laughs off the accusation, dragging Chief around Drifter Camp instead. The Chief learns from the locals that Dudu has been cleaning for the old woman in recent months. As the day goes on, Dudu is shown to be much beloved by the Drifter Camp, and shares that others have been caring for the woman as well in spite of her temperament. Just as the Chief is about to conclude the trip, Dudu directs them to the home of an old man, who reveals that the "Pa… ma…" the old woman spoke of is actually "Palama." According to him, Palama supposedly can be found in an uninhabited building, which years ago was the subject of a local tragedy after it was struck by lightning. Dudu admits that she knew there was no Parma intelligence, but the Chief dismisses her concerns, saying that she would have allowed Dudu to return had they known her reason. Having come this far, the two decide to investigate Palama anyways, with Dudu hoping she might be able to bring the old woman some peace in her final days.

The so-called lead about// Parma //is indeed just a pretext Dudu has made up for going back to the Drifter Camp to visit a severely ill old lady. But guided by Dudu, you interact with the residents there and observe their customs and habits up close, making quite a few useful discoveries. However, just when you're about to go home, you learn from the local elderly that the old lady's mind has been occupied by something named// Palama. //The truth about everything seems to hide in an abandoned building destroyed in a disaster.
interrogation3:
As they explore the building, Dudu shares some of her past. She explains that the song she plays, the Song of the Phoenix, was taught to her by her suona teacher, and can be played for both the living and dead. When the Chief asks about how her teacher is now, she reveals that he died during a gang shooting some time after they came to DisCity. The two find some of the old woman's belongings, including a photo and diary belonging to her grandson, the aforementioned Palama. The diary reveals that he was one of the casualties in the lighting strike incident, and that the woman had been visiting him up until her dementia began to worsen. Dudu solemnly asks that they return them to the old woman, and the Chief agrees. Upon arriving at her home, however, they find that she passed peacefully in her sleep. As requested, Dudu plays her a funeral dirge. Afterwards, Dudu says that her teacher told her that death is not the end, but rather that being forgotten is. The Chief reassures her that as long as the two of them remember their tale, the old woman and Palama will live on.

Palama is in fact the old lady's grandson who died years ago. When you arrive at her home with the photo and diary she left in the abandoned building, she's already had her last breath in her dream. As promised, Dudu plays a suona tune for her for the last time. Just as Dudu's master once said, death is not the end of life, forgetting is. The story of the old lady and Palama will live on in your memories.
arrestRec1: The Chief meets Dudu on the way to Syndicate for a rescue mission. At the early stage of the mission, the Chief works with Dudu and learns about the existence of Oak Casket from her. When the mission is completed, Dudu, wishing to be around Oak Casket, decides to go to the MBCC with the Chief and agrees to be detained.
arrestRec2: Dudu once joined a ceremonial band that worked for a gang, but the band broke up after the gang was wiped out. Dudu, now without a stable job, drifts around in Syndicate and, thanks to Oak Casket, plays at funerals and in banquets here and there.
arrestRec3: Dudu's power is highly stimulating to life beings. Since she awakened her power, Dudu has been based in Syndicate, where she has stirred up many gang wars and civil unrest. Most often than not, Dudu creates confusion as a distraction from her smuggling activities.
arrestRec4: Dudu is an unregistered Outlander who came to Syndicate from a satellite city located far away. She was taken in by a troupe when she was a kid and entered Syndicate illegally with the troupe. Later on, the troupe was annihilated in a large gang war where Mania weapons were used, with Dudu being the only survivor.
servingTerm1: The MBCC didn't confiscate Dudu's Suona when she was detained. And now she plays it on and off the clock, whenever it pleases her. Once, the MBCC received 118 complaints about Dudu's Suona playing in one day, both from the other Sinners and MBCC staffers.
servingTerm2: Dudu has a strong opinion about the food in the MBCC cafeteria. She once mounted a protest by eating nothing but steamed rice mixed with soy sauce and chili paste for a whole month, but called it quit when nothing came of it. At the moment, she is cultivating good relations with the cafeteria staffers, trying to earn herself a chance to cook.
servingTerm3: No one wants to live next to Dudu's room, except for Oak Casket. Other than that, Dudu gets along well enough with the other Sinners. She once went stargazing with Stargazer, and they read each other's palms.
servingTerm4: When the Chief successfully lessens Oak Casket's Maniac symptoms, Dudu becomes more trusting of the Chief, and starts to rein in her unruliness and becomes nicer to the Chief. "The food in your cafeteria is atrocious. You hungry? Would you like me to make a bowl of noodles for you?" she once said to the Chief.
emotionCheck1:
[Dudu comes out of the kitchen with a plate full of fried pork chops.]

**Dudu:** Hey, boss. Are you here for some snacks too?

**Chief:** ……

* **Prompt:** Yes, just got back from a mission and I'm a little peckish.
 * **Dudu:** Today's pork chops taste pretty good. Let me get you some.
 * **Dudu:** 😉

* **Prompt:** No, I'm just passing by.
 * **Dudu:** Then you should watch me eat. Maybe you'll get hungry.
 * **Dudu:** 😏
emotionCheck2:
[Dudu loudly advertises her suona classes.]

**Dudu:** Don't miss it! The first 20 students get half off their tuition! Hey, boss over there, don't go. Want to learn suona with me?

**Chief:** ……

* **Prompt:** How many people have signed up?
 * **Dudu:** We are hoping you could be the first! Come on, I'll give you a discount!
 * **Dudu:** 😘

* **Prompt:** I'm kind of busy.
 * **Dudu:** That's so heartless! As a qualified boss you should support my career!
 * **Dudu:** 😖
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Fear's Nemesis

//Movie screenings in the Recreation Area are always accompanied by suona sound these days.//

**System Notifications:** Several fainthearted Sinners always bring Dudu with them when they watch horror movies. They ask her to play her suona when they get scared.

* **Prompt:** ...I got it.
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Outdoor Activity Wonder

//Why do birds follow Dudu everywhere?//

**System Notifications:** You find that several little birds often follow Dudu, especially when she plays the suona.

* **Prompt:** Why?

**Chief:** When you recall the name of that tune she always plays, realization dawns on you.
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Where Are the Chicken Legs

//A strange incident has been happening in the cafeteria recently.//

**System Notifications:** A strange incident has been happening recently. The chicken legs in the cafeteria always disappear. The surveillance camera has captured Dudu's sneaky silhouette, and you've indeed found three chicken legs in her pocket and three others in her sleeves.

* **Prompt:** Why did you steal the chicken legs?

**Dudu:** Hehe, Boss, I'm sorry. In the past, whenever I went to a wedding banquet or an after-funeral repast, I always felt the urge to sneak out a few bites. Old habits die hard.
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Eating Is a Blessing

//Chief and Dudu have lunch in the cafeteria.//

**System Notifications:** You and Dudu have lunch in the cafeteria.

**Dudu:** Boss, why aren't you eating?

**Dudu:** Do you not like the food today?

* **Prompt:** No...

**Dudu:** Oh, I know, you must be on diet?

* **Prompt:** No...

**Dudu:** You can't be full already, can you?

**Chief:** ...I'm indeed already full.

**Dudu:** Oh my god! You eat like a bird! That's like barely even a starter for me.

**Chief:** I don't eat like a bird, you eat like a horse!

**Chief:** Half a roast chicken is quite enough!
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠ The Pursuit of Art

//Chief runs into a frustrated Dudu during a walk in the Outdoor Activity Area.//

**System Notifications:** You happen to see a frustrated Dudu during a walk in the Outdoor Activity Area. Normally, she seems energetic all the time and never likes to be alone.

**System Notifications:** So you walk over and pat her on the shoulder.

* **Prompt:** Dudu? What's wrong?

**Dudu:** I hit an obstacle in my pursuit of art.

* **Prompt:** You're pursuing art?

**Dudu:** Boss! Why do you sound so doubtful?!

**Dudu:** I'm a legit musician who earns a living with her craft, okay?

**Chief:** Okay... What obstacle did you hit then?

**Dudu:** Remember the other day I gathered all the Sinners in the Bureau who played musical instruments to try to form a band? After a few practices, I realized no one could match my suona, so we disbanded.

* **Prompt:** Comfort her

**Chief:** Don't feel too bad about it. Failure teaches success, you'll eventually overcome the obstacle if you keep trying.

**Dudu:** Boss! You're right!

**Chief:** ...?

**Dudu:** Why don't you be my first band member? Just play the tambourine or something!

**Dudu:** I'm sure your participation can help my band regain its past glory!

**Chief:** Um... I actually don't think I'm gifted enough...
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Buy One Get One

//Chief receives a complaint ticket from Sinner Dudu.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
You received a request from Sinner Dudu. Please confirm.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**Dudu:** Complaint! I want to file a complaint!

**Dudu:** That staff in the detention area! He was chasing and hitting me!

**Dudu:** Luckily I ran fast enough, or I'd have to play the suona for myself!

**System Notifications:** Supervision System:
The surveillance footage is over. Would you like to call for Sinner Dudu?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**Dudu:** Boss! My dear Boss! You must hear me out!

**Chief:** Slow down. What happened?

**Dudu:** What do you mean what happened? He was trying to hit me!

* **Prompt:** Why did he hit you?

**Dudu:** I heard he just took bereavement leave, so I simply asked if he needed my suona service.

**Dudu:** I even gave him a friendly discount. Buy one get one suona service, he can save it for next time.

**Chief:** ...

* **Prompt:** Teasing
 * **Chief:** And you wonder why he wanted to hit you?

* **Prompt:** Persuade tactfully
 * **Chief:** Ahem, don't do that again.
 * **Chief:** I know you meant no harm, but it may sound insensitive to others.
 * **Chief:** Besides, who doesn't know you play the suona in the MBCC? If they need your service, they'll look for you.
 * **Dudu:** Okay...
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Welcome! Only 100,000 DisCoins for a song by me! I can play it from dawn to dusk——what a steal, eh? How about it, boss? Want to order one?

[Raise to Phase 1]
"No matter how much I practice, I only know how to play this one song."

[Raise to Phase 3]
Money, life, and death are all up to fate. On second thought, they can be up to me!

[Level Start]
That's a lot of people. By the way, I charge per person for my show.

[Win Battles]
How was it? The song's not bad, eh?

[Lose Battles]
Woah, woah, you could just tell me to stop. There's no need to get violent.

[Ultimate Skill]
Reincarnation is the endless cycle of life!

[Die in Battles]
Don't be afraid... I'll leave... without a fuss.

[Greeting]
Look who I bumped into! My my, it's my lucky day!

[Conversation 1]
If someone in our line of work doesn't believe in reincarnation, they'd lose their job.

[Conversation 2]
It's music, not noise!

[Conversation 3]
Oak Casket's box sure smells good! You can sleep deep and sound in it without a worry!

[Special Conversation 1]
Passing away is nothing to be scared of. I will guide you to where you need to be. Then, we shall meet again.

[Special Conversation 2]
To rise from the ashes, one must first burn to cinders. As long as you endure the searing pain, you shall be granted rebirth.

[Special Conversation 3]
Maybe it was you who guided me across the Lethe?

[Full Compliance]
I believe in reincarnation, but there are many things in life that one cannot take away after death. Will you still remember me after reincarnating...? No worries. Even if you forget, I will do everything possible to meet you again and make you remember me forever!

[Idle]
I'm so bored. How about I play a song to cheer you up, boss?

[Annoyed]
It's broad daylight! I'll scream if you do this! Unless you pay for the emotional trauma!

[Special Attention]
I know I'm cute, but don't look at me like that... are you in the mood for another show?

[Dispatch]
Let me see, am I working for heaven? Or just playing for mortals?

[Dispatch Complete]
Sigh, I didn't make much this time, but I'll give you a share!

[Level Up]
Not bad, not bad. Care to tip a bit more?
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Come one, come all! Feast your eyes on the performance of this great musician! Just trying to make a living here! Your kind support will be appreciated!

[Greeting]
Thanks for watching! If you enjoyed the performance, please show some support! DisCoins, Hypercubes—any currency is welcome! I also take digital payment! Whatever's convenient for you! 

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Hey there, you little brat! Aren't you afraid of karma? Put it back, you hear me ? Tsk, people have no morals anymore. The world has really gone to the dogs... 

[Ordinary Contact 2]
...Huh? My erhu performance sounds like sawing wood? Nonsense! You're just too uncultured to appreciate the erhu classics I'm playing... Why is this stupid stereo jammed again? I spent a fortune on it at the second-hand shop!

[Idle] 
...Hmm? No one's around right now. Lemme take a break...

[Annoyed]
Ahem, boss, mind your manners. Don't get all handsy. I'm a proper artist.

[Special Attention] 
Boss, you've been staring at me for a long time. Why, you wanna have a duet with me? ...Come come, don't be shy. You take the erhu, I'll play the suona... 

[Level Up}
Hehe, thanks boss! Thank you so much! May you be blessed with fame and fortune!
nightmareTalent: For each battle won, all allied Sinners gain a 3% damage boost. The boost is capped at 30%.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Phoenix's Elegy
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New Exclusive Ultimate [King of Birds]. Dudu unleashes the power of the phoenix within the target grid. The damage of allied units within that range will increase by 3%/3.5%/4% every 4 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to 5 times and lasts for 4 seconds. [King of Birds] can only be used once per battle.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "May misfortunes be gone and confusion be broken. May you part with pain, find happiness, and gain eternal bliss."

maniaIntensify.title: Blow Your Own Trumpet
maniaIntensify.text: When an allied unit marked with [Phoenix's Call] is on the field, Dudu restores 1% of max HP per second.

pros: Provides decent amp with some single target healing
P1 gives the Ulted Sinner Max HP bonus
cons: Buffed target needs to stay on Dudu's ECB grid
Not as intuitive to use as other buffers

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
Dudu's role is all too often misconceived as "healer", when her true role is being a buffer.
 VS a Fear immune boss (which most are these days), Dudu's buff surpasses Enfer. Dudu can provide 20% dmg buff to two different Sinners, as well as another 20% to a target with her ECB Ult. Her heal is simply a nice bonus that helps keep your carry a little healthier.

The downside however, is that Dudu does not feel as nice to use because of the un-intuitiveness of her ability. The dmg bonus applies when Dudu either Ults someone else, or the Ulted Sinner moves out of Dudu's heal range rather than being a point and click ability. Dudu's ECB is even worse, requiring your carry to permanently stay on the grid with Dudu's ECB Ult, or at least return there before the next 4 second tick or you will lose all of the accumulated damage buff and have to stack it from scratch. The positive thing is that this ECB Ult is a permanent 20% dmg bonus, and the grid stays even after Dudu dies.

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Prologue
crimebrandSets.note: Buffs the team's Attack whenever she ults, as well as increase healing done.

crimebrandSets.name: Nightmare Revelation
crimebrandSets.note: Dudu is a fine carrier for Nightmare Revelation in BFL due to not needing energy Crimebrands since she starts off with two full charges of Ult. It doesn't really matter what you have in Slot II.

crimebrandSets.name: Afterglow + Prologue
crimebrandSets.note: Boosts nearby allied Sinners' Attack by 10% after Dudu uses Ult. Although the Attack increase provided is larger than Justice, Afterglow has a 20s cooldown and does not apply mapwide, making it more difficult to use than Justice.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Musical Performance
skills.description: Dudu gives a Musical Performance instead of performing Normal Attacks, restoring (Attack * 26%) HP per second to an allied unit marked with [Phoenix's Call] within the performance range.

skills.name: Song of Phoenix
skills.description: Dudu marks 1 allied unit within her performance ranged with [Phoenix's Call], which lasts for the entire battle. When using the Ultimate again on allied unit already marked with [Phoenix's Call], restores (Attack * 350%) HP for that unit. When the unit leaves the performance range, or when another allied unit gains the [Phoenix's Call], the effect of the previous [Phoenix's Call] will disappear. [Song of Phoenix] can be recharged up to 2 times.

skills.name: Come Home to Roost
skills.description: The allied unit marked with [Phoenix's Call] gains 5% Max HP bonus, restoring 1% of Max HP per second.

upgrade.description: Max HP bonus increases to $0%. Restores $0% of Max HP per second.

skills.name: Triumphant Silence
skills.description: When [Phoenix's Call] ends, the allied unit's damage dealt increases by 13.3% for 8 seconds.

compliance: Unlock information: Surveillance records to unlock emoticons
Unlock Information: Surveillance Records Unlock Voice: Obedience Level Up Unlock Title: Fate Guide

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Welcome! Only 100,000 DisCoins for a song by me! I can play it from dawn to dusk—what a steal, eh? How about it, boss? Want to order one?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: いらっしゃい！一曲10万ディスコイン。悪いこと言わないから、死ぬ前に一度は聞いていきなよ。それとも、あんたの葬儀で演奏してやろうか？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 어서 옵쇼! 한 곡에 단돈 10만 디스코인입니다! 낮부터 밤까지, 듣고 싶은 만큼 불어드려요! 어때요, 저렴하죠? 한 곡 들어보시겠어요, 사장님?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 欢迎光临！我这一首曲子10万狄斯币，想吹多久吹多久，能从白吹到黑，划算吧？老板要来一曲吗？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 歡迎光臨！我這一首曲子10萬狄斯幣，想吹多久吹多久，能從白吹到黑，划算吧？老闆要來一曲嗎？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: No matter how much I practice, I only know how to play this one song.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: いくら練習しても、あたしはこの曲しか吹かないけど。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 아무리 연습을 많이 해도 내가 연주할 줄 아는 곡은 이 곡 하나뿐이야.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 练的再多，我也只会吹这一首曲子呀。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 練得再多，我也只會吹這一首曲子呀。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: Money, life, and death are all up to fate. On second thought, they can be up to me!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: 死生命有り、富貴天に在り。いや、あたしにあるかもね。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 운명이란 건 하늘의 뜻에 달렸지. 으음, 어쩌면 나한테 달렸을지도?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 死生有命富贵在天，也可能在我。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 死生有命富貴在天，也可能在我。
voicelines.Level Start - EN: That's a lot of people. By the way, I charge per person for my show.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 人が多いなぁ。曲を聞きたいなら、人数分払いなよ。
voicelines.Level Start - KR: 사람이 꽤 많네. 곡 감상은 머릿수대로 돈 받습니다~
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 人还挺多，听曲儿按人头收费哦。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 人還挺多，聽曲按人頭收費哦。
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: How was it? The song's not bad, eh?
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 怎么样，曲儿还不错听吧？
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: Woah, woah, you could just tell me to stop. There's no need to get violent.
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: 聞きたくないからって、人を殴るんじゃないよ……
voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 싫으면 싫다고 할 것이지, 왜 때리고 난리야?
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 不要就不要呗，怎么还打人呢。
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 不要就不要唄，怎麼還打人呢。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - EN: Reincarnation is the endless cycle of life!
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: Don't be afraid... I'll leave... without a fuss.
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: 怖くない……あたし、もう……行くよ。
voicelines.Die in Battles - KR: 무서워하지 마… 좋은 곳으로… 갈 테니까.
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Look who I bumped into! My my, it's my lucky day!
voicelines.Greeting - JP: こんな所で会うなんて、今日は運がいいみたいだねぇ。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 외출하자마자 귀인을 만나다니, 오늘은 운이 좋네~
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 出门遇贵人，看来今天运气不错~
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 出門遇貴人，看來今天運氣不錯~
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: If someone in our line of work doesn't believe in reincarnation, they'd lose their job.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: こんな商売してるんだ。生死流転を信じないと職失っちまう。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 윤회도 믿지 않으면서 우리와 같은 일을 하다간 순식간에 실직하고 말 걸?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 做我们这行，要是不相信什么轮回，那可是会砸饭碗的。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 做我們這行，要是不相信什麼輪迴，那可是會砸飯碗的。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: これは芸術。騒音なんかじゃない。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 예술가가 하는 일을 어떻게 민폐라고 할 수 있지?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 艺术家的事儿，能叫扰民吗？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 藝術家的事，能叫擾民嗎？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Oak Casket's box sure smells good! You can sleep deep and sound in it without a worry!
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: オークで作られた棺はいい匂いがするね。中で寝ても、全然怖くない。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 떡갈나무로 만든 관은 냄새가 아주 좋아. 그 안에서 잠든다면 두렵지 않겠지.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 橡木板板做的盒儿味道挺好闻的，就算睡在里面，也不会感到害怕吧。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 橡木闆闆做的盒味道挺好聞的，就算睡在裡面，也不會感到害怕吧。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: Passing away is nothing to be scared of. I will guide you to where you need to be. Then, we shall meet again.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 死は別に怖くない。あたしがあんたを行くべき場所に導いて、そしてまた会えるから。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 숨을 거두는 것도 그렇게 무섭진 않아. 난 네가 가야 할 곳으로 인도하고 우린 다시 만나게 될 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 咽气儿倒也没那么可怕，我会引导你去该去的地方，然后再次相遇。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 咽氣倒也沒那麼可怕，我會引導你去該去的地方，然後再次相遇。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: To rise from the ashes, one must first burn to cinders. As long as you endure the searing pain, you shall be granted rebirth.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 生まれ変わるには炎に身を投じる必要があるらしい。その苦しみに耐えられたら、きっと新しい人生を手に入れられるよ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 부활을 위해선 반드시 고통을 감내해야 해. 뼈를 깎는 고통을 겪은 뒤에야 새로운 삶을 얻을 수 있는 법이야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 重生必定要浴火，只要承受住了剔肉削骨的痛苦，就一定能获得新生。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 重生必定要浴火，只要承受住了剔肉削骨的痛苦，就一定能獲得新生。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Maybe it was you who guided me across the Lethe?
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: もしかしたら、あの橋であたしを導いてくれるのはあんたかもね。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 그 다리를 건너도록 날 이끌어 줄 사람이 너일지도 모르잖아?
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 说不定，引导我渡过那座桥的，是你呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 說不定，引導我渡過那座橋的，是你呢？
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I believe in reincarnation, but there are many things in life that one cannot take away after death. Will you still remember me after reincarnating...? No worries. Even if you forget, I will do everything possible to meet you again and make you remember me forever!
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 生死流転は信じるけど、転生したら忘れることも多いんだろ？転生しても、あたしのこと覚えててくれるかい……？大丈夫、あんたが忘れても、あたしはどんな手段を使ってももう一度あんたと知り合って、二度と忘れないようにしてやるさ！
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 난 윤회를 믿긴 하지만, 공수래공수거라는 말도 있잖아. 윤회 후에도 과연 네가 날 기억할 수 있을까…? 괜찮아, 기억 못 하더라도 반드시 너를 찾아가서, 다시 날 기억하고, 더는 날 잊지 못하게 해줄 테니까!
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 我相信生死轮回，可很多东西生不带来死不带去的，轮回之后你还会记得我吗……？没关系，就算不记得，我也会想尽一切办法，让你重新认识我，并且再也无法忘记我！
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 我相信生死輪迴，可很多東西生不帶來死不帶去的，輪迴之後你還會記得我嗎……？沒關係，就算不記得，我也會想盡一切辦法，讓你重新認識我，並且再也無法忘記我！
voicelines.Idle - EN: I'm so bored. How about I play a song to cheer you up, boss?
voicelines.Idle - JP: 退屈だなぁ。一曲吹いてやろうか？
voicelines.Idle - KR: 심심하네. 뭐라도 연주해서 흥을 돋아야 하나?
voicelines.Idle - CN: 好无聊啊，不如我吹个曲给老板助助兴？
voicelines.Idle - TW: 好無聊啊，不如我吹個曲給老闆助助興？
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: It's broad daylight! I'll scream if you do this! Unless you pay for the emotional trauma!
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: まだ昼なのに、そんなことしたら人呼ぶよ！口止め料があるなら話は別だけど！
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 백주대낮에 이러면 소리 지를 거야? 돈이라도 주면 모를까.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 青天白日的，你这么做我可是会叫的！除非有捂嘴费！
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 青天白日的，你這麼做我可是會叫的！除非有捂嘴費！
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: I know I'm cute, but don't look at me like that... are you in the mood for another show?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あたしが可愛いからって、そんなじろじろ見なくてもいいんじゃないか？それとも、曲が聞きたいのかい？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 내가 귀여운 건 알고 있는데, 꼭 그렇게까지 쳐다봐야 해~? 아니면 노래가 듣고 싶어진 거야?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 我知道我很可爱，但也不用这么看着我吧~还是你想听曲儿了？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 我知道我很可愛，但也不用這麼看著我吧~還是你想聽曲了？
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Let me see, am I working for heaven? Or just playing for mortals?
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: どれどれ？その仕事は現世からの？それとも、黄泉の国からの？
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 让我看看，是去西天干活儿，还是留在阳间吹曲儿啊？
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 讓我看看，是去西天幹活，還是留在陽間吹曲啊？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Sigh, I didn't make much this time, but I'll give you a share!
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: やぁ、あんまり稼いでないけど、少しくらいなら分けてやってもいいよ！
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 어휴, 얼마 벌지도 못했네. 그래도 조금은 나눠줄게!
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 嗨，这趟活儿也没赚多少，不过还是分你点吧！
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 唉，這趟活也沒賺多少，不過還是分你點吧！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Not bad, not bad. Care to tip a bit more?
voicelines.Level Up - JP: いいね。もっとおくれよ！
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 음음, 좋아좋아. 인심 좀 더 쓰시죠, 사장님~?
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 不错不错，再给点儿呗老板？
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 不錯不錯，再給點唄老闆？

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Come one, come all! Feast your eyes on the performance of this great musician! Just trying to make a living here! Your kind support will be appreciated!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 二胡パフォーマンス！寄ってらっしゃい見てらっしゃい！あたしは芸を売ってご飯代を稼いでるんだ。通りすがりの心優しい旦那に姉さん方、聞いていっておくれよ！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 길거리 예술가입니다! 작은 손재주로 먹고살고 있죠! 마음씨 좋은 사장님들~ 잘 부탁드려요!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 天桥卖艺！自立自强！凭手艺挣点饭钱，还请各位心善的过路老板多多照顾生意啦！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 天橋賣藝！自立自強！憑手藝掙點飯錢，還請各位心善的過路老闆多多照顧生意啦！
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Thanks for watching! If you enjoyed the performance, please show some support! DisCoins, Hypercubes—any currency is welcome! I also take digital payment! Whatever's convenient for you!
voicelines.Greeting - JP: ご清聴ありがとう！いいと思ったら投げ銭をよろしく。ディスコインを持ってるならディスコインを、イレギュラーキューブを持ってるならイレギュラーキューブをどうぞ。二次元コードのスキャンでもいいよ。色んな支払い方法に対応してるから、好きなのを選んでおくれ！
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 보내주신 성원에 감사드립니다! 괜찮으셨다면 관람비 부탁드립니다. 디스코인이든 큐브든 뭐든 상관없습니다! 카드 결제도 환영! 원하시는 결제 방식으로 주십시오!
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 感谢捧场！如果觉得还不错就来给我打个赏呗，有狄斯币的给点狄斯币，有异方晶的给块异方晶，扫码也行，支持多种支付方式，您怎么方便怎么来！
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 感謝捧場！如果覺得還不錯就來給我打個賞唄，有狄斯幣的給點狄斯幣，有異方晶的給塊異方晶，掃碼也行，支持多種支付方式，您怎麼方便怎麼來！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Hey there, you little brat! Aren't you afraid of karma? Put it back, you hear me? Tsk, people have no morals anymore. The world has really gone to the dogs...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: おいおいおい！そこのガキ！人が苦労して稼いだお金を盗むなんて、罰当たりな！早く箱に戻しなよ。聞いてるのかい？あたしが本当に目が見えないと思ってるようだね……あーあ、世の中がどんどん悪くなってくよ。最近の人は昔みたいに心が綺麗じゃないねぇ……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 거기! 거기 너, 꼬맹이! 남이 피땀을 흘려 번 돈을 훔치다니, 천벌이 무섭지도 않아? 빨리 돈 다시 박스에 집어넣어! 내가 진짜 아무것도 안 보이는 줄 아나… 쯧쯧, 인심이 이래서야 세상이 어떻게 되려는지…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 喂喂喂！那边的小鬼！偷人家血汗钱是会遭报应的！快给我放回盒子里来听见没有！还真当我看不见呢……啧啧，世风日下，人心不古啊……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 喂喂喂！那邊的小鬼！偷人家血汗錢是會遭報應的！快給我放回盒子裡來聽見沒有！還真當我看不見呢……嘖嘖，世風日下，人心不古啊……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: ...Huh? My erhu performance sounds like sawing wood? Nonsense! You're just too uncultured to appreciate the erhu classics I'm playing... Why is this stupid stereo jammed again? I spent a fortune on it at the second-hand shop!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: ……は？あたしの演奏がのこぎりで木を切ってるみたいだって？バカ言わないでよ。あんたの鑑賞レベルが足りてないだけだろ。二胡の名曲を30曲も流してるのに……このゴミスピーカー、なんでまた止まってんのさ！大枚はたいて中古屋で買ったのに。頼むよ……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: …하? 내 연주 실력이 형편없다고? 헛소리하지 마, 네 귀가 잘못된 거겠지. 내가 틀어놓은 건 무려 호금 명곡 30선이라고… 아니 이 라디오는 왜 또 말썽이지? 고물상에서 거금 들여 사 온 건데, 믿을 게 하나 없다니까…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: ……哈？我拉琴像锯木头？胡扯，明明是你没有欣赏水平，我放的这可是二胡名曲三十首……这破音响怎么又卡带了！还是我花了重金从旧货摊子淘来的呢，能不能靠点谱……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: ……哈？我拉琴像鋸木頭？胡扯，明明是你沒有欣賞水準，我放的這可是二胡名曲三十首……這破音響怎麼又卡帶了！還是我花了重金從舊貨攤子淘來的呢，能不能靠點譜……
voicelines.Idle - EN: ...Hmm? No one's around right now. Lemme take a break...
voicelines.Idle - JP: ……ん？今は誰もいないし、ちょっと休憩……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Ahem, boss, mind your manners. Don't get all handsy. I'm a proper artist.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: ゴホン、気をつけな。勝手に触るんじゃないよ。あたしは真面目な芸術家なんだ。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 크흠, 거기 사장님 조심 좀 하시지? 뭘 그렇게 건드려, 내가 이래 봬도 정직한 예술가거든?
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 咳，这位老板麻烦注意一下，不要动手动脚，我可是正经艺术家。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 咳，這位老闆麻煩注意一下，不要動手動腳，我可是正經藝術家。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Boss, you've been staring at me for a long time. Why, you wanna have a duet with me? ...Come come, don't be shy. You take the erhu, I'll play the suona...
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あたしをずっと見てたようだけど、どうしたんだい？合奏でもしたいのか？……ほらほら、照れなくていいよ。二胡をあんたに貸して、あたしはチャルメラを吹こう……
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 사장님, 왜 그렇게 쳐다봐? 뭐… 나랑 합주라도 한 곡 하고 싶은 거야? 좋아, 부끄러워하지 말고, 난 나팔을 불 테니 호금을 연주해 봐…
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 老板，我看你盯着我很久了，怎么，是想跟我合奏一曲？……来来来，别害羞嘛，二胡给你，我吹唢呐……
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 老闆，我看你盯著我很久了，怎麼，是想跟我合奏一曲？……來來來，別害羞嘛，二胡給你，我吹嗩吶……
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Hehe, thanks boss! Thank you so much! May you be blessed with fame and fortune!
voicelines.Level Up - JP: へへ、ありがとうございます！ありがとうございます！あなた様が昇進して給料が上がりますように。道端で大金を拾えますように。宝くじで一等が当たりますように！
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 헤헤, 감사합니다, 사장님! 승진하시고, 돈 많이 버시고, 길에서 큰돈 주우시고, 복권에 당첨되시길!
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 嘿嘿，多谢老板！多谢老板！祝老板升职又加薪，路上捡大钞，彩票中头奖！
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 嘿嘿，多謝老闆！多謝老闆！祝老闆升職又加薪，路上撿大鈔，彩券中頭獎！
